skills.intro: I believe skills shouldn't really be measured in numbers. But as we go around working or learning, we always find ourselves evaluating ourselves by comparing our expertise on something and the other. What better way to compare than numbers? Below are my approximate skill levels in various tech fields. Some of which might be missing and some might have a little margin of error because of the parameters I considered while quantifying the qualitative factor.

about.intro:
I am a full-stack developer and a freelancer. I have worked in the software development field for the last 5 years.
Besides the magic of being able to keep trying on and on until my code finally works, and keep coding for 24 hours to make an effort to develop something that will make the world a better place, I also provide help and support to newbies. While I help them with what I already know I also try and learn from them.
I love to explore the possibilities via experiments and push my limits bit by bit. I am always looking for new challenges to learn and grow myself.
Looking for an opportunity to secure a challenging and reputed position as a successful software developer at a well-known software company that offers a positive atmosphere to grow my knowledge and skills while implementing those for the betterment of the organization I work for.

1.title: High School
1.description: High school, which is also called "Secondary education" in Nepal takes place in 2 stages: Grades 9 & 10. It follows a common academic curriculum leading to a "School leaving certificate".

2.title: Intermediate
2.description: The intermediate level of education in Nepal is referred to as Plus 2 (+2). It starts after the successful completion of ten years of schooling with passing grades. Plus 2 programs are available in streams like Science, Management, Humanities, and Education.

experience.intro: As I started to learn to program and understand the fascinating stuff we can do with it, I always kept wondering about its potential. I always experimented and tried to understand various technologies by either building projects out of them, or recreating libraries that already exist on my own. I have done several projects for clients ranging from individual to medium-sized software companies. Except for those experiences, the followings are my formal/official work experiences:

1.title: Family Tree
1.description: 'Family Tree', intends to allow users to create, collect, organize, visualize and print their family tree using their phone or computer. This system will help researchers or individuals who are interested in identifying their family tree and their ancestors, know the exact relationship amongst family members and eliminate the tedious task of searching for their name in the family tree book that was previously used to be handwritten. This System will help its users to find, identify, and know details about their relatives. This system also has the potential of becoming a go-to system for family chat and connection.

3.title: Phone Directory
3.description: Public phone directory where anyone can view, add, and edit phone numbers.

4.title: PPTS (PUBG Points Table)
4.description: This Game Points Table generation and tournament hosting system is Specially intended for PUBG But works on similar games.

1.title: Suitable for
1.info: Shooting games with similar ranking as PUBG

5.title: EReal Estate
5.description: A system that eliminates the excessive cost of hiring brokers and the frustrating process of finding both: available properties to purchase and customer who wants to buy property; on time. Anyone who is interested can offer their bid to the property and one can easily find out if it is the right price for the property or not. This system gives a platform for the same user to perform both actions: buying and selling. It helps users to find a suitable property to purchase using the search feature which provides a handful of tools to filter search contents. Using the power and potential of python programming language working with technologies like Maria DB, Redis, ASGI, Bootstrap, jQuery, etc.

6.title: Personal website CMS
6.description: CMS may sound like a big word. But A content management system (CMS) is computer software used to manage the creation and modification of digital content (content management). Personal-Website-CMS does just that. It provides CMS to publish a personal website with the bare minimum features. If CMS sounds inconvenient, you may call it Micro-CMS.

2.title: Useful for
2.info: Personal website, galery, project showcase etc.

7.title: Third eye
7.description: Medical Report plays a very important role in the cure of any disease. But if the medical history of a patient is way big and handwritten, it is hard for anyone to extract the required information from them. 'Third Eye' allows doctors to get managed information about the medical history of the patient. Doctors will get a platform to write medical reports in an electric medium, allowing them to manage their appointments with patients so the risky and unsecured traditional paper file method will be replaced. Additionally, Third Eye will allow users to print their medical reports in hard and or soft copy it will be easy to extract and share only the required part. The records will be grouped categorically. Doctors will be allowed to comment or write reviews on old reports so that old reports may also be used to explain the new issues. Patients will also be able to log in and access their medical history and status.

1.title: Web Development
1.description: I can help you create your internet presence by building a website for you or your business. It can help to promote your company's brand name. When your website is accessible via the World Wide Web, you or your company is considered operating on a worldwide scale. This means that a little-known company may be looked for, and its items can be delivered to clients who are far away.

2.title: Software Development
2.description: I build software that can not only help you save your time and money but also keeps your record safe and accurate. The speed of computer software can outnumber thousands of humans working together. So any information can be retrieved more quickly and with greater confidence in its accuracy. This can improve productivity. It may also improve the movement of goods and the supply of goods to customers if you are running a business.

3.title: IT Advice
3.description:
Information technology helps to build and grow the commerce and business sector and generate the maximum possible output. The time taken by different sectors to generate business is now minimized with advancements in Information technology. It provides electronic security, storage, and efficient communication.
If you ever stumbled upon any technical issue, and got frustrated by the intimidating outcomes/aftermath, I might be able to help you.

4.title: Bulk Data Entry
4.description:
Data entry automation refers to software-based solutions that can optimize data entry by eliminating or reducing manual processes. Such software can typically extract data from PDFs, documents, images, emails, or websites and present just the relevant info in a structured format.
I can build software solutions that allow you to extract data from images, text, PDFs, and websites among other things. This data can then be safely structured into a format of your desire.

services.intro:
I provide a wide range of services including web development, large data entry using automation, software development, etc.
